name: Songs-of-The-Fallen-Races
description:
A Songs of the Fallen Race Mod
Inspired by Malazan Book of the Fallen series by Steven Erickson
Commissioned and managed by By Rake
Created by ArsGothica
id=2129044833


Hair, Eyebrows, and Facepaint from images are from the amazing RA mod
Made with compatibility of other mods in mind so without those mods you may see some duplicate head slots. Unfortunately, due to the nature of the way Conan handles the character creation screen there is no way around this that i am curently aware of.

Compatibility:
Load before AoC
- Male head slots 5-10 and 20-21
- Female head slots  8-12
Load Before Emberlight
- Female head slots 24+

Sotf Races uses head slots
Male Head Slots 11-19 and 22-23
female head slots  13-23


Will create patch to load beards with custom faces
UI changes overwritten by Other mods that modify the same



Be sure to check out these recommended mods
Ectomongers Set Creatures - https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=190351847
Ectomongers Yog Creatures - https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1908075921
Rp Aesthetics - https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1542041983




Discord
https://discord.gg/4RbcudC
changeNote: updated for full compatibility with AoC heads
